name: the improv dungeon
description:
Hey! This is a two sided 3x5 handy thing for me for coming up with interesting OSR feel dungeons on the spot. Usually a theme starts to come across too!

That stats in it are referring to Wander, the business card rpg by Nate Treme (Highland Paranormal Society), but I also use it for other games like the Black Hack and whatnot! 

The categories it has: 

  • room
  • look
  • enemies
  • contents
  • path
  • tricks
  • traps
  • doors
  • loot

btw, sick cover art by David Sutherland from the og tomb of horrors & that other picture is a dungeon I made in a few minutes this morning
